Description:
Located in Da Lat, 1.7 miles from Dalat Flower Gardens, Akama Boutique Đà Lạt has accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an electric tea pot, a shower, a hairdryer and a closet. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, some rooms at the hotel also feature a city view.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or Italian options.

Akama Boutique Đà Lạt offers 3-star accommodations with a spa center.

Dalat Palace Golf Club is 2.2 miles from the accommodation, while Xuan Huong Lake is 2.6 miles from the property. Lien Khuong Airport is 21 miles away.

Description:
Located in Da Lat, within 2 miles of Lam Vien Square and 2.1 miles of Xuan Huong Lake, Q's House Dalat provides accommodations with a terrace and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features family rooms.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, some units at Q's House Dalat also provide guests with a city view. All guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Guests at Q's House Dalat will be able to enjoy activities in and around Da Lat, like cycling.

Yersin Park is 2.2 miles from the hotel, while Dalat Flower Gardens is 2.7 miles from the property. Lien Khuong Airport is 18 miles away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Located in Da Lat, a 15-minute walk from Lam Vien Square, The White Hotel provides accommodations with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The property is around 1.6 miles from Dalat Flower Gardens, 1.8 miles from Dalat Palace Golf Club and 3.6 miles from Truc Lam Temple. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, an electric tea pot, a bidet, free toiletries and a closet. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at the hotel also offer a city view.

Popular points of interest near The White Hotel include Xuan Huong Lake, Yersin Park and Hang Nga Crazy House. Lien Khuong Airport is 17 miles away.
